item.title: Ansible playbook for setting up Nextcloud on a Raspberry Pi 3B
item.description: I recently got a new SD card for my Raspberry Pi 3B, so I had to reinstall Nextcloud and I took the opportunity to create an Ansible playbook for it. I basically went through the steps described in my previous note ‘Nextcloud server on a Raspberry Pi 3B’ and I turned them into a playbook.
